PackagePresentation.LoginTitle: میز کار امن پرداز (مکاپ) br/ span16/ نسخه نظارتی جامع سازمانی /span
PackagePresentation.ELoginTitle: Amnpardaz McAP Supervisor br/ span16/ McAP Enterprise Monitoring System /span

Activity.title: View_Associated_Users_MenuItems
Activity.Label: منوی شخصی کاربر
Activity.Name: View_Associated_Users_MenuItems
Activity.CommandText: SELECT Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu.ShortcutID,Sys_Gui_MenuItems.MenuItemID,Sys_Gui_MenuItems.Label,Sys_Gui_ActivityContexts.Label,Sys_Gui_MenuItems.Description FROM Sys_Gui_MenuItems INNER JOIN Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu ON Sys_Gui_MenuItems.MenuItemID = Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu.MenuItemID INNER JOIN Sys_Gui_ActivityContexts ON CAST(SUBSTRING([Action],43,7) AS INT)=Sys_Gui_ActivityContexts.ActivityContextID WHERE (Sys_Gui_MenuItems.Icon='fa-list' OR Sys_Gui_MenuItems.Icon='fa-Supervisor') AND (Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu.UserID = @ObjectID)

Activity.title: View_Non_Associated_MenuItems_to_User
Activity.Label: مشاهده منو
Activity.Name: View_Non_Associated_MenuItems_to_User
Activity.CommandText: SELECT Sys_Gui_MenuItems.MenuItemID,Sys_Gui_ActivityContexts.Label,Sys_Gui_MenuItems.Description FROM Sys_Gui_MenuItems INNER JOIN Sys_Gui_ActivityContexts ON CAST(SUBSTRING([Action],43,7) AS INT)=Sys_Gui_ActivityContexts.ActivityContextID WHERE ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu WHERE (Sys_Gui_MenuItems.MenuItemID = Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu.MenuItemID) AND (Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu.UserID = @ObjectID)) = 0) AND (Sys_Gui_MenuItems.NavigationID=1004) AND (Sys_Gui_MenuItems.Icon='fa-list' OR Sys_Gui_MenuItems.Icon='fa-Supervisor') AND dbo.HasAccess( MenuItemID, @ObjectID ) = 1

Activity.title: Add_New_ShortcutMenu
Activity.Label: افزودن صفحه به منوی شخصی
Activity.Name: Add_New_ShortcutMenu
Activity.CommandText: INSERT INTO Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu(UserID,MenuItemID) SELECT N'@ParentObjectID', MenuItemID FROM Sys_Gui_MenuItems WHERE (MenuItemID = @ObjectID)

Activity.title: Remove_ShortcutMenu
Activity.Label: حذف صفحه از منوی شخصی
Activity.Name: Remove_ShortcutMenu
Activity.CommandText: DELETE FROM Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu WHERE (ShortcutID = @ObjectID)

Activity.title: View_Associated_Users_ReportMenuItems
Activity.Label: منوی گزارشات کاربر
Activity.Name: View_Associated_Users_ReportMenuItems
Activity.CommandText: SELECT Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu.ShortcutID,Sys_Gui_MenuItems.MenuItemID,Sys_Gui_MenuItems.Label,Sys_Gui_ActivityContexts.Label,Sys_Gui_MenuItems.Description FROM Sys_Gui_MenuItems INNER JOIN Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu ON Sys_Gui_MenuItems.MenuItemID = Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu.MenuItemID INNER JOIN Sys_Gui_ActivityContexts ON CAST(SUBSTRING([Action],43,7) AS INT)=Sys_Gui_ActivityContexts.ActivityContextID WHERE (Sys_Gui_MenuItems.Icon LIKE '%chart%') AND (Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu.UserID = @ObjectID)

Activity.title: View_Non_Associated_ReportMenuItems_to_User
Activity.Label: مشاهده گزارشات
Activity.Name: View_Non_Associated_ReportMenuItems_to_User
Activity.CommandText: SELECT Sys_Gui_MenuItems.MenuItemID,Sys_Gui_ActivityContexts.Label,Sys_Gui_MenuItems.Description FROM Sys_Gui_MenuItems INNER JOIN Sys_Gui_ActivityContexts ON CAST(SUBSTRING([Action],43,7) AS INT)=Sys_Gui_ActivityContexts.ActivityContextID WHERE ((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu WHERE (Sys_Gui_MenuItems.MenuItemID = Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu.MenuItemID) AND (Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu.UserID = @ObjectID)) = 0) AND (Sys_Gui_MenuItems.NavigationID=1004) AND (Sys_Gui_MenuItems.Icon LIKE '%chart%') AND dbo.HasAccess( MenuItemID, @ObjectID ) = 1

Activity.title: Add_New_ReportMenu
Activity.Label: افزودن صفحه به منوی گزارشات
Activity.Name: Add_New_ReportMenu
Activity.CommandText: INSERT INTO Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu(UserID,MenuItemID) SELECT N'@ParentObjectID', MenuItemID FROM Sys_Gui_MenuItems WHERE (MenuItemID = @ObjectID)

Activity.title: Remove_ReportMenu
Activity.Label: حذف صفحه از منوی شخصی
Activity.Name: Remove_ReportMenu
Activity.CommandText: DELETE FROM Sys_Prs_ShortcutMenu WHERE (ShortcutID = @ObjectID)

Activity.title: Change_User_Password
Activity.Label: تغییر رمز عبور کاربر
Activity.Name: Change_User_Password
Activity.CommandText: UPDATE Sys_Users SET Password = '@Password', _LastModifyDate = GETDATE() WHERE (UserID = '@SessionUserID')

Activity.title: Create_New_Dashboard_Page
Activity.Label: ایجاد صفحه داشبورد جدید
Activity.Name: Create_New_Dashboard_Page
Activity.CommandText: EXEC [dbo].[CreateDashboardPage] @DashboardName, @DashboardName

Activity.title: Reset_User_Password
Activity.Label: تغییر رمز عبور کاربر
Activity.Name: Reset_User_Password
Activity.CommandText: UPDATE Sys_Users SET Password = '@Password' WHERE (UserID = @ObjectID)

Activity.title: View_OrganizationalChart
Activity.Label: مشاهده چارت سازمانی
Activity.Name: View_OrganizationalChart
Activity.CommandText: SELECT Viw_Org_OrganizationalChart.ID AS ID, Viw_Org_OrganizationalChart.InternalID AS InternalID, Viw_Org_OrganizationalChart.ParentID2 AS ParentID2, Viw_Org_OrganizationalChart.Label AS Label, Viw_Org_OrganizationalChart.Enabled AS Enabled, Viw_Org_OrganizationalChart.ParentID AS ParentID, Viw_Org_OrganizationalChart.Type AS Type, Viw_Org_OrganizationalChart._IsDeleted AS IsDeleted FROM Viw_Org_OrganizationalChart ORDER BY Viw_Org_OrganizationalChart.ParentID, Viw_Org_OrganizationalChart._Position

Activity.title: View_Overview_Chart_1
Activity.Label: گروه های دارایی
Activity.Name: View_Overview_Chart_1
Activity.CommandText: SELECT TOP(20) Cfg_CITypes.Category, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM Cfg_CIs INNER JOIN Cfg_CITypes ON Cfg_CIs.CITypeID = Cfg_CITypes.CITypeID GROUP BY Cfg_CITypes.Category ORDER BY 2 DESC

Dataset.Name: CIDataset1
Dataset.Label: دیتاست دارایی ها 1
Dataset.QueryText: SELECT Cfg_CIs.CIID AS ID, Org_Regions.Label, Cfg_CIs.Identifier, Cfg_CIs.OrganNumber, Cfg_CIs.OwnerName, Cfg_CIs.SecurityOption00, Cfg_CIs.SecurityOption01, Cfg_CIs.SecurityOption04, Cfg_CIs.SerialNumber, Cfg_CIs.OwnerEmployeeID, Cfg_Vendors.Label AS Cfg_Vendors_Label, Cfg_Products.Label AS Cfg_Products_Label, Cfg_CIStatuses.Label AS Cfg_CIStatuses_Label, Org_Sites.Label, Org_SubRegions.Label, Cfg_CITypes.Label, Org_Buildings.Label, Cfg_CITypes.Category, Org_SubRegions.RegionID, Org_Sites.SubRegionID, Cfg_CIs.CITypeID, Cfg_CIs.LastUpdate FROM Cfg_CIs LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CITypes ON Cfg_CIs.CITypeID = Cfg_CITypes.CITypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CIStatuses ON Cfg_CIs.CIStatusID = Cfg_CIStatuses.CIStatusID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Products ON Cfg_CIs.ProductID = Cfg_Products.ProductID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Vendors ON Cfg_CIs.VendorID = Cfg_Vendors.VendorID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Regions ON Cfg_CIs.RegionID = Org_Regions.RegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Sites ON Cfg_CIs.SiteID = Org_Sites.SiteID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_SubRegions ON Cfg_CIs.SubRegionID = Org_SubRegions.SubRegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Buildings ON Cfg_CIs.BuildingID = Org_Buildings.BuildingID

Report.Name: CIReport1
Report.Label: لیست دارایی ها
Report.QueryText: SELECT Cfg_CIs.CIID AS ID, Cfg_CIs.Identifier, Cfg_CIs.OrganNumber, Cfg_CIs.OwnerName, Cfg_CIs.SecurityOption00, Cfg_CIs.SecurityOption01, Cfg_CIs.SecurityOption04, Cfg_CIs.SerialNumber, Cfg_CIs.OwnerEmployeeID, Cfg_Vendors.Label AS Cfg_Vendors_Label, Cfg_Products.Label AS Cfg_Products_Label, Cfg_CIStatuses.Label AS Cfg_CIStatuses_Label, Org_Regions.Label, Org_Sites.Label, Org_SubRegions.Label, Cfg_CITypes.Label, Org_Buildings.Label, Cfg_CITypes.Category, Org_SubRegions.RegionID, Org_Sites.SubRegionID, Cfg_CIs.CITypeID, Cfg_CIs.LastUpdate FROM Cfg_CIs LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CITypes ON Cfg_CIs.CITypeID = Cfg_CITypes.CITypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CIStatuses ON Cfg_CIs.CIStatusID = Cfg_CIStatuses.CIStatusID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Products ON Cfg_CIs.ProductID = Cfg_Products.ProductID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Vendors ON Cfg_CIs.VendorID = Cfg_Vendors.VendorID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Regions ON Cfg_CIs.RegionID = Org_Regions.RegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Sites ON Cfg_CIs.SiteID = Org_Sites.SiteID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_SubRegions ON Cfg_CIs.SubRegionID = Org_SubRegions.SubRegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Buildings ON Cfg_CIs.BuildingID = Org_Buildings.BuildingID ORDER BY Org_Regions.Label

Report.Name: CIReport2
Report.Label: آمار دارایی به تفکیک مجموعه ها
Report.QueryText: SELECT Org_Regions.RegionID AS ID, Org_Regions.Label, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM Cfg_CIs LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CITypes ON Cfg_CIs.CITypeID = Cfg_CITypes.CITypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CIStatuses ON Cfg_CIs.CIStatusID = Cfg_CIStatuses.CIStatusID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Products ON Cfg_CIs.ProductID = Cfg_Products.ProductID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Vendors ON Cfg_CIs.VendorID = Cfg_Vendors.VendorID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Regions ON Cfg_CIs.RegionID = Org_Regions.RegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Sites ON Cfg_CIs.SiteID = Org_Sites.SiteID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_SubRegions ON Cfg_CIs.SubRegionID = Org_SubRegions.SubRegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Buildings ON Cfg_CIs.BuildingID = Org_Buildings.BuildingID GROUP BY Org_Regions.Label, Org_Regions.RegionID

Report.Name: CIReport3
Report.Label: آمار دارایی به تفکیک زیرمجموعه ها
Report.QueryText: SELECT Org_SubRegions.SubRegionID AS ID, Org_Regions.Label, Org_SubRegions.Label, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM Cfg_CIs LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CITypes ON Cfg_CIs.CITypeID = Cfg_CITypes.CITypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CIStatuses ON Cfg_CIs.CIStatusID = Cfg_CIStatuses.CIStatusID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Products ON Cfg_CIs.ProductID = Cfg_Products.ProductID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Vendors ON Cfg_CIs.VendorID = Cfg_Vendors.VendorID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Regions ON Cfg_CIs.RegionID = Org_Regions.RegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Sites ON Cfg_CIs.SiteID = Org_Sites.SiteID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_SubRegions ON Cfg_CIs.SubRegionID = Org_SubRegions.SubRegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Buildings ON Cfg_CIs.BuildingID = Org_Buildings.BuildingID GROUP BY Org_Regions.Label, Org_SubRegions.Label, Org_SubRegions.SubRegionID

Report.Name: CIReport4
Report.Label: آمار دارایی به تفکیک سایت ها

Report.QueryText: SELECT Cfg_CITypes.Category AS ID, Cfg_CITypes.Category, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM Cfg_CIs LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CITypes ON Cfg_CIs.CITypeID = Cfg_CITypes.CITypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CIStatuses ON Cfg_CIs.CIStatusID = Cfg_CIStatuses.CIStatusID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Products ON Cfg_CIs.ProductID = Cfg_Products.ProductID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Vendors ON Cfg_CIs.VendorID = Cfg_Vendors.VendorID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Regions ON Cfg_CIs.RegionID = Org_Regions.RegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Sites ON Cfg_CIs.SiteID = Org_Sites.SiteID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_SubRegions ON Cfg_CIs.SubRegionID = Org_SubRegions.SubRegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Buildings ON Cfg_CIs.BuildingID = Org_Buildings.BuildingID GROUP BY Cfg_CITypes.Category

Report.Name: SystemReport3
Report.Label: آمار سیستم به تفکیک زیرمجموعه ها
Report.QueryText: SELECT Org_SubRegions.SubRegionID AS ID, Org_Regions.Label, Org_SubRegions.Label, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM Cfg_CIs LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CITypes ON Cfg_CIs.CITypeID = Cfg_CITypes.CITypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CIStatuses ON Cfg_CIs.CIStatusID = Cfg_CIStatuses.CIStatusID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Products ON Cfg_CIs.ProductID = Cfg_Products.ProductID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Vendors ON Cfg_CIs.VendorID = Cfg_Vendors.VendorID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Regions ON Cfg_CIs.RegionID = Org_Regions.RegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Sites ON Cfg_CIs.SiteID = Org_Sites.SiteID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_SubRegions ON Cfg_CIs.SubRegionID = Org_SubRegions.SubRegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Buildings ON Cfg_CIs.BuildingID = Org_Buildings.BuildingID WHERE Cfg_CITypes.Category = N'سيستم ها' GROUP BY Org_Regions.Label, Org_SubRegions.Label, Org_SubRegions.SubRegionID

Report.Name: CIReport4
Report.Label: آمار سیستم به تفکیک سایت ها
Report.QueryText: SELECT Org_Sites.SiteID AS ID, Org_Regions.Label, Org_SubRegions.Label, Org_Sites.Label, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM Cfg_CIs LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CITypes ON Cfg_CIs.CITypeID = Cfg_CITypes.CITypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CIStatuses ON Cfg_CIs.CIStatusID = Cfg_CIStatuses.CIStatusID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Products ON Cfg_CIs.ProductID = Cfg_Products.ProductID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Vendors ON Cfg_CIs.VendorID = Cfg_Vendors.VendorID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Regions ON Cfg_CIs.RegionID = Org_Regions.RegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Sites ON Cfg_CIs.SiteID = Org_Sites.SiteID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_SubRegions ON Cfg_CIs.SubRegionID = Org_SubRegions.SubRegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Buildings ON Cfg_CIs.BuildingID = Org_Buildings.BuildingID WHERE Cfg_CITypes.Category = N'سيستم ها' GROUP BY Org_Regions.Label, Org_SubRegions.Label, Org_Sites.Label, Org_Sites.SiteID

Report.Name: SystemReport5
Report.Label: آمار سیستم به تفکیک طبقه بندی
Report.QueryText: SELECT Org_Regions.Label, Cfg_CIs.SecurityOption00, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM Cfg_CIs LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CITypes ON Cfg_CIs.CITypeID = Cfg_CITypes.CITypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CIStatuses ON Cfg_CIs.CIStatusID = Cfg_CIStatuses.CIStatusID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Products ON Cfg_CIs.ProductID = Cfg_Products.ProductID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Vendors ON Cfg_CIs.VendorID = Cfg_Vendors.VendorID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Regions ON Cfg_CIs.RegionID = Org_Regions.RegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Sites ON Cfg_CIs.SiteID = Org_Sites.SiteID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_SubRegions ON Cfg_CIs.SubRegionID = Org_SubRegions.SubRegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Buildings ON Cfg_CIs.BuildingID = Org_Buildings.BuildingID WHERE Cfg_CITypes.Category = N'سيستم ها' GROUP BY Org_Regions.Label, Cfg_CIs.SecurityOption00

Report.Name: SystemReport6
Report.Label: آمار سیستم به تفکیک شبکه
Report.QueryText: SELECT Org_Regions.Label, Cfg_CIs.SecurityOption04, COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM Cfg_CIs LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CITypes ON Cfg_CIs.CITypeID = Cfg_CITypes.CITypeID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_CIStatuses ON Cfg_CIs.CIStatusID = Cfg_CIStatuses.CIStatusID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Products ON Cfg_CIs.ProductID = Cfg_Products.ProductID LEFT OUTER JOIN Cfg_Vendors ON Cfg_CIs.VendorID = Cfg_Vendors.VendorID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Regions ON Cfg_CIs.RegionID = Org_Regions.RegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Sites ON Cfg_CIs.SiteID = Org_Sites.SiteID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_SubRegions ON Cfg_CIs.SubRegionID = Org_SubRegions.SubRegionID LEFT OUTER JOIN Org_Buildings ON Cfg_CIs.BuildingID = Org_Buildings.BuildingID WHERE Cfg_CITypes.Category = N'سيستم ها' GROUP BY Org_Regions.Label, Cfg_CIs.SecurityOption04

Dependency.Name: Viw_Org_OrganizationalChart
Dependency.ApplySQL: IF OBJECT_ID (N'[Viw_Org_OrganizationalChart]') IS NOT NULL DROP VIEW [Viw_Org_OrganizationalChart] GO CREATE VIEW [dbo].[Viw_Org_OrganizationalChart] AS SELECT 'RegionID$' + dbo.InString(RegionID) AS ID, 'RegionID$0000000000' AS InternalID, 0 AS ParentID2, Label , Enabled, '#' AS ParentID ,'Region' AS Type, _IsDeleted,-1 _Position FROM Org_Regions UNION ALL SELECT 'SubRegionID$' + dbo.InString(SubRegionID) AS ID, 'SubRegionID$0000000000' AS InternalID, 0 AS ParentID2, Label , Enabled, 'RegionID$' +dbo.InString(RegionID) AS ParentID ,'SubRegion' AS Type, _IsDeleted,-1 _Position FROM Org_SubRegions UNION ALL SELECT 'SiteID$' + dbo.InString(SiteID) AS ID, 'SiteID$0000000000' AS InternalID, 0 AS ParentID2, Label, Enabled, 'SubRegionID$' + dbo.InString(SubRegionID) AS ParentID ,'Site' AS Type, _IsDeleted,-1 _Position FROM Org_Sites UNION ALL SELECT 'DepartmentID$' + dbo.InString(DepartmentID) AS ID, 'DepartmentID$0000000000' AS InternalID, SiteID AS ParentID2, Label , Enabled, CASE WHEN Parent_DepartmentID IS NOT NULL THEN 'DepartmentID$' + LTRIM(RTRIM(STR(Parent_DepartmentID))) ELSE 'SiteID$' + LTRIM(RTRIM(STR(SiteID))) END AS ParentID ,'Department' AS Type, _IsDeleted,_Position FROM Org_Departments UNION ALL SELECT 'PersonnelID$' + dbo.InString(Org_Positions.PositionID) AS ID , 'PersonnelID$' + dbo.InString(Org_Personnels.PersonnelID) AS InternalID, Org_Positions.SiteID AS ParentID2, Org_Positions.JobPosition + ' [ ' + Org_Personnels.Label + ' ]' AS Label , Org_Positions.Enabled, CASE WHEN DepartmentID IS NOT NULL THEN 'DepartmentID$' + dbo.InString(DepartmentID) ELSE 'SiteID$' + dbo.InString(Org_Positions.SiteID) END AS ParentID ,'Personnel' AS Type, Org_Positions._IsDeleted,-1 _Position FROM Org_Positions INNER JOIN Org_Personnels ON Org_Personnels.PersonnelID=Org_Positions.PersonnelID WHERE DepartmentID IN (SELECT DepartmentID FROM Org_Departments)
